verbs.description: [V: refried] [ARG1: bean - taco pizza] when i ’m in a rush i take advantage of convenient prepared pizza crust to create this mexican - style pizza if you like it spicy add a little chopped jalapeno pepper to the skillet when cooking the beef —mary detweiler middlefield ohio
